text: The Fighter is a 2010 biographical, sports and drama movie. This movie is about professional boxing. Amy Adams plays Charlene. Melissa Leo plays Alice. Leo received an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress in 2011. This movie was released on December 10, 2010 in the United States. Russell
title: The Fighter
